name: Mercer
description:
Mercer the mug is just itching to come home with you! What could make a morning better than sipping your favorite beverage out of this smiley guy?

Mercer is made out of heavy duty stoneware clay with a lead free glaze that is food safe and dishwasher safe. He will gladly hold 8 ounces of your favorite beverage.

name: Chandler
description:
Chandler the mug is just itching to come home with you!  What could make a morning better than sipping your favorite beverage out of this smiley guy?  

Chandler is made out of heavy duty stoneware clay with a lead free glaze that is food safe and dishwasher safe.  He will gladly hold 8 ounces of your favorite beverage.

name: Lana
description:
Lana the owl mug is just itching to come home with you!  What could make a morning better than sipping your favorite beverage out of this wise little owl?  

Lana is made out of heavy duty stoneware clay with a lead free glaze that is food safe and dishwasher safe.  She will gladly hold 8 ounces of your favorite beverage.

name: Arnie
description:
Arnie is the type of guy that was just built for big beverages, be it beer, coffee, or anything else you're thirsty for. This guy will hold 16 ounces of your favorite beverages.

Arnie is made with heavy duty stoneware clay and a lead free glaze that is food safe and dishwasher safe.

name: Edmund
description: Edmund the monster platter will graciously take care of serving your snacks, although he might try to sneak a bite! This platter measures 11 inches in diameter and has edges that round up to keep your food in one spot.  He is glazed with lead-free, food safe glazes.
